title: MontPythonn
author: MontPythonn
content: If you ever gambled on any of these sites FavBet, VBET, Pin-UP, Mostbet и 1win, Bet365crypto, Pinnacle, GG.bet, retivabet, betandyou (with crypto)message me on telegram: https://t.me/BlockCyphercom

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Suspicious!!1. There's a neutral warning from nutildah.2. OP is using different telegram than he used back in the day.3. Current telegram username says he is from blockcypher.com, the popular explorer. I doubt OP is involved with blockcypher.All these creates flag!! If you are going to contact him, be aware about potential scam plan of OP.Edit-4. Such stupid behavior is another big flag.Quote from: MontPythonn on September 02, 2023, 11:28:01 AMDafuq is wrong with your mom? You have a report from Tom for sending him to heavenI don't need your shit here, gtfo.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: MontPythonn on September 02, 2023, 11:20:10 AMIf you ever gambled on any of these sites FavBet, VBET, Pin-UP, Mostbet и 1win, Bet365crypto, Pinnacle, GG.bet, retivabet, betandyou (with crypto)message me on telegram: https://t.me/BlockCyphercomLet's say I'm a player of this casino, what will be the benefits that I can get by sending you PM on telegram for helping you on your research? Do you incentivize each user that will help you? Also, Why does the discussion need to be in telegram while anyone that is willing to help can simply answer your question and post it here. Assuming that you will not give us some link to play with other casino. Bitcointalk has a lot of gambler. You should move this to gambling discussion board if you are looking for a survey for a better result.

comments.author: MontPythonn
comments.body: Quote from: Coin_trader on September 02, 2023, 11:45:41 AMQuote from: MontPythonn on September 02, 2023, 11:20:10 AMIf you ever gambled on any of these sites FavBet, VBET, Pin-UP, Mostbet и 1win, Bet365crypto, Pinnacle, GG.bet, retivabet, betandyou (with crypto)message me on telegram: https://t.me/BlockCyphercomLet's say I'm a player of this casino, what will be the benefits that I can get by sending you PM on telegram for helping you on your research? Assuming that you will not give us some link to play with other casino. Bitcointalk has a lot of gambler. You should move this to gambling discussion board if you are looking for a survey for a better result.You have a good point of view but you don't know my perspective/needs. send a message if you have used them with crypto and earn some cents to a dollar for my research. I dont' need your accounts and I am not buying accounts

I didn’t mention about any form of selling. Since you post thread on services section, This means that you are paying someone to do service for you or else you are just asking a survey which I suggested to move this on gambling discussion thread so that user that involves in gamblign will easily find your thread.Judging on how you take opinion here seems like you are very hard to deal with. GL!

Keep your pennies and go berate people somewhere else.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Quote from: MontPythonn on September 03, 2023, 03:39:31 PMReplying to what bullshit? That's no allegation that's an idiot trying to be smart, how this community can be so lame..There's no accusation but I have put a warning just to make sure people are doing enough research before they try to jump in. I didn't say you scammer but your activities are quite like a typical scammer here. You are always free to prove us wrong.Can you please explain or confirm whether you are from blockcypher team or not? Because your telegram is saying so, it raises a concern. If you are from blockcypher, that's fine. But if you aren't (which I believe and very much likely), why on earth anyone would use the username of another company? Only impersonating scammers do that. Prove that you are from blockcypher or you are a scammer.
